As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

DevOps EngineerÂ : We are hiring now !We are hiring now !we have an openings for DevOps with 2 freshers + 1 Senior DevOps engineer requirement, majorly looking out with Azure & Shell scripting knowledge as priority.Kindly find the attached JD for your reference and let us know with the relevant profiles for the same.Job Summary :We are seeking a skilled and experienced DevOps Engineer to join our team. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

DevOps EngineerÂ : We are hiring now !We are hiring now !we have an openings for DevOps with 2 freshers + 1 Senior DevOps engineer requirement, majorly looking out with Azure & Shell scripting knowledge as priority.Kindly find the attached JD for your reference and let us know with the relevant profiles for the same.Job Summary :We are seeking a skilled and experienced DevOps Engineer to join our team. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. DevOps EngineerÂ : We are hiring now !We are hiring now !we have an openings for DevOps with 2 freshers + 1 Senior DevOps engineer requirement, majorly looking out with Azure & Shell scripting knowledge as priority.Kindly find the attached JD for your reference and let us know with the relevant profiles for the same.Job Summary :We are seeking a skilled and experienced DevOps Engineer to join our team. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

DevOps EngineerÂ : We are hiring now !We are hiring now !we have an openings for DevOps with 2 freshers + 1 Senior DevOps engineer requirement, majorly looking out with Azure & Shell scripting knowledge as priority.Kindly find the attached JD for your reference and let us know with the relevant profiles for the same.Job Summary :We are seeking a skilled and experienced DevOps Engineer to join our team. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

DevOps EngineerÂ : We are hiring now !We are hiring now !we have an openings for DevOps with 2 freshers + 1 Senior DevOps engineer requirement, majorly looking out with Azure & Shell scripting knowledge as priority.Kindly find the attached JD for your reference and let us know with the relevant profiles for the same.Job Summary :We are seeking a skilled and experienced DevOps Engineer to join our team. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

DevOps EngineerÂ : We are hiring now !We are hiring now !we have an openings for DevOps with 2 freshers + 1 Senior DevOps engineer requirement, majorly looking out with Azure & Shell scripting knowledge as priority.Kindly find the attached JD for your reference and let us know with the relevant profiles for the same.Job Summary :We are seeking a skilled and experienced DevOps Engineer to join our team. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

Hiring freshers can bring fresh energy, new perspectives, and a long-term investment in talent. While they may lack direct experience, fresh graduates often come with a strong academic foundation, a willingness to learn, and a high level of adaptability. They are eager to prove themselves and can quickly adapt to company culture, bringing innovative ideas and enthusiasm to the workplace.By hiring freshers, companies can mold and shape talent to meet their specific needs, building a workforce that is loyal and aligned with the company's values and goals.Additionally, freshers are often more cost-effective in terms of salary and can grow within the organization, reducing recruitment costs in the long run. DevOps EngineerÂ : We are hiring now !We are hiring now !we have an openings for DevOps with 2 freshers + 1 Senior DevOps engineer requirement, majorly looking out with Azure & Shell scripting knowledge as priority.Kindly find the attached JD for your reference and let us know with the relevant profiles for the same.Job Summary :We are seeking a skilled and experienced DevOps Engineer to join our team. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

Hiring freshers can bring fresh energy, new perspectives, and a long-term investment in talent. While they may lack direct experience, fresh graduates often come with a strong academic foundation, a willingness to learn, and a high level of adaptability. They are eager to prove themselves and can quickly adapt to company culture, bringing innovative ideas and enthusiasm to the workplace.By hiring freshers, companies can mold and shape talent to meet their specific needs, building a workforce that is loyal and aligned with the company's values and goals.Additionally, freshers are often more cost-effective in terms of salary and can grow within the organization, reducing recruitment costs in the long run. Investing in young talent also helps create a diverse and dynamic team, ensuring that businesses stay ahead of industry trends by fostering a culture of learning and continuous improvement.Ultimately, hiring freshers is an opportunity for organizations to invest in the future, building a sustainable and motivated workforce that can drive long-term success.hashtag#hiring hashtag#partimehashtag#fulltime hashtag#workinghashtag#onlineworkinghashtag#hiring hashtag#nowhashtag#partimehashtag#oportunityhashtag#workfromhomehashtag#workfromofficehashtag#delhi hashtag#noidahashtag#linkdin hashtag#india

DevOps EngineerÂ : We are hiring now !We are hiring now !we have an openings for DevOps with 2 freshers + 1 Senior DevOps engineer requirement, majorly looking out with Azure & Shell scripting knowledge as priority.Kindly find the attached JD for your reference and let us know with the relevant profiles for the same.Job Summary :We are seeking a skilled and experienced DevOps Engineer to join our team. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

Hiring freshers can bring fresh energy, new perspectives, and a long-term investment in talent. While they may lack direct experience, fresh graduates often come with a strong academic foundation, a willingness to learn, and a high level of adaptability. They are eager to prove themselves and can quickly adapt to company culture, bringing innovative ideas and enthusiasm to the workplace.By hiring freshers, companies can mold and shape talent to meet their specific needs, building a workforce that is loyal and aligned with the company's values and goals.Additionally, freshers are often more cost-effective in terms of salary and can grow within the organization, reducing recruitment costs in the long run. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

Hiring freshers can bring fresh energy, new perspectives, and a long-term investment in talent. While they may lack direct experience, fresh graduates often come with a strong academic foundation, a willingness to learn, and a high level of adaptability. They are eager to prove themselves and can quickly adapt to company culture, bringing innovative ideas and enthusiasm to the workplace.By hiring freshers, companies can mold and shape talent to meet their specific needs, building a workforce that is loyal and aligned with the company's values and goals.Additionally, freshers are often more cost-effective in terms of salary and can grow within the organization, reducing recruitment costs in the long run. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

Hiring freshers can bring fresh energy, new perspectives, and a long-term investment in talent. While they may lack direct experience, fresh graduates often come with a strong academic foundation, a willingness to learn, and a high level of adaptability. They are eager to prove themselves and can quickly adapt to company culture, bringing innovative ideas and enthusiasm to the workplace.By hiring freshers, companies can mold and shape talent to meet their specific needs, building a workforce that is loyal and aligned with the company's values and goals.Additionally, freshers are often more cost-effective in terms of salary and can grow within the organization, reducing recruitment costs in the long run. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

Hiring freshers can bring fresh energy, new perspectives, and a long-term investment in talent. While they may lack direct experience, fresh graduates often come with a strong academic foundation, a willingness to learn, and a high level of adaptability. They are eager to prove themselves and can quickly adapt to company culture, bringing innovative ideas and enthusiasm to the workplace.By hiring freshers, companies can mold and shape talent to meet their specific needs, building a workforce that is loyal and aligned with the company's values and goals.Additionally, freshers are often more cost-effective in terms of salary and can grow within the organization, reducing recruitment costs in the long run. DevOps EngineerÂ : We are hiring now !We are hiring now !we have an openings for DevOps with 2 freshers + 1 Senior DevOps engineer requirement, majorly looking out with Azure & Shell scripting knowledge as priority.Kindly find the attached JD for your reference and let us know with the relevant profiles for the same.Job Summary :We are seeking a skilled and experienced DevOps Engineer to join our team. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support our development and deployment processes. Your expertise in Azure, CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, system administration, shell scripting, Kubernetes, and Docker will be essential in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our software delivery pipeline.Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on Azure cloud platform. Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to streamline software development and delivery. Utilize Jenkins to automate build, test, and deployment workflows. Develop and maintain Ansible playbooks for configuration management and infrastructure provisioning. Perform system administration tasks, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance. Write shell scripts to automate routine tasks and enhance operational efficiency. Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes and Docker containers. Collaborate with development teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on infrastructure and deployment best practices. Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies in DevOps, cloud computing, and containerization.Requirements:Solid experience working with Azure cloud platform, including knowledge of Azure services and infrastructure components.Proficiency in implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Strong understanding of configuration management tools, particularly Ansible.Sound knowledge of system administration concepts and practices.Proficiency in shell scripting (e.g., Bash) for automation and system administration tasks. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.Preferred qualifications:Relevant certifications in Azure, DevOps, or related areas.Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools, such as Terraform.Knowledge of other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform).Familiarity with other CI/CD tools, such as GitLab CI/CD or CircleCI.Understanding of monitoring and logging tools.Experience with agile development methodologies.Preferably Looking only for Tamilnadu based CandidatesWork from office OnlyRegards.,HR Depa...

Hiring freshers can bring fresh energy, new perspectives, and a long-term investment in talent. While they may lack direct experience, fresh graduates often come with a strong academic foundation, a willingness to learn, and a high level of adaptability. They are eager to prove themselves and can quickly adapt to company culture, bringing innovative ideas and enthusiasm to the workplace.By hiring freshers, companies can mold and shape talent to meet their specific needs, building a workforce that is loyal and aligned with the company's values and goals.Additionally, freshers are often more cost-effective in terms of salary and can grow within the organization, reducing recruitment costs in the long run.
